docs.title: Vindicta CLI
docs.text:
Your command center for competitive Warhammer 40k.

A powerful, Typer-based CLI for dice rolling, match tracking, and AI predictions — all from your terminal.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: uv pip install git+https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Vindicta-CLI.git

docs.title: Quick Examples
docs.text:
# Roll dice
vindicta dice roll 2d6

# Track a match
vindicta match new --player-list my.json

# Get predictions
vindicta oracle predict --my-list my.json

docs.title: Why CLI?
docs.text:
• Speed — No UI overhead
  • Scriptable — Automate workflows
  • Portable — Works anywhere Python runs

Full Platform

docs.title: Setup Guide
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Vindicta-CLI.git
cd Vindicta-CLI
uv venv && uv pip install -e ".[dev]"
pytest tests/ -v

docs.title: dice
docs.text:
vindicta dice roll 2d6
vindicta dice roll 3d6 --count 10

docs.title: match
docs.text:
vindicta match new --player-list my.json
vindicta match score --turn 2 --primary 15
vindicta match end --winner player
vindicta match list --last 10

docs.title: oracle
docs.text:
vindicta oracle predict --my-list my.json
vindicta oracle sleepers --faction Tyranids

docs.title: economy
docs.text:
vindicta economy balance
vindicta economy history

docs.title: warscribe
docs.text:
vindicta warscribe register --unit Captain --id CPT-01
vindicta warscribe action "[MOVE: CPT-01 -> Zone-A]"

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text:
• Python 3.10+
  • uv (recommended)

docs.title: Install
docs.text: uv pip install git+https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Vindicta-CLI.git

docs.title: Verify
docs.text: vindicta --version

docs.title: Shell Completion
docs.text:
# Bash
vindicta --install-completion bash

# Zsh
vindicta --install-completion zsh

# PowerShell
vindicta --install-completion powershell

docs.text: Status: Proposed | Accepted Date: YYYY-MM-DD

docs.title: ADR-001: Python as Primary Language
docs.text: Status: Accepted Date: 2026-02-01

docs.title: Context
docs.text: This repository requires a programming language for implementation.

docs.title: Decision
docs.text: We adopt Python 3.10+ as the primary language.

docs.title: Rationale
docs.text:
• Vindicta Platform is Python-first
  • Typer/Rich CLI ecosystem
  • Seamless integration with other modules

docs.title: Alternatives Considered
docs.text: Alternative Decision Rust Rejected — slower iteration Go Rejected — less expressive

docs.title: Consequences
docs.text:
• All source code uses Python 3.10+
  • Type hints required on all public APIs

docs.title: ADR-002: Pre-commit Hooks Required
docs.text: Status: Accepted Date: 2026-02-01

docs.title: Decision
docs.text: All repositories MUST configure pre-commit hooks with ruff.

docs.title: Consequences
docs.text:
• .pre-commit-config.yaml required
  • Developers run pre-commit install
